title: [Large-Scale] Synchronous e-Learning-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and fundamental language knowledge related to job tasks
context.additional_context: Blended Learning Environment Combining Real-Time Video Lectures and Offline Tutorials in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Settings

learning_goals: Learners can accurately acquire 50 specialized terms in synchronous e-learning environments and apply them in professional contexts
Learners can reduce language errors in business communication scenarios by 30% through real-time video coaching
Learners can achieve a weekly online assignment submission rate of over 95% and demonstrate the ability to revise based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
